mapper.insert: INSERT INTO video ( user_id, title, detail_contents, created_at, updated_at, like_count, bad_count, hits) VALUES (#{userId}, #{title}, #{detailContents}, now(), now(), 0, 0, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT user_id, title, detail_contents, updated_at, like_count, bad_count, hits FROM video WHERE id=#{id}
